title: Psycho Beasts
description: Welcome to Serpentine City. The Mafia rule, and we're about to be indoctrinated. Cobra's the heir to the throne, and he's been given an ultimatum.Form a pack...or else.Now, we're fighting for our lives and each other.Will Jax, Xerxes, Ascher, and Cobra fall apart under the pressure?Will Sadie be strong enough to handle what they want? Will their tension crumble into hatred? Or build into love? Between training and fighting for our lives, it's about to go down like never before. We may have survived the Fae realm, but the real test has just begun.
author: Jasmine Mas
